name: Off-Oven Roast Beef
recipeYield: 4 to 6 main courses, with leftovers for sandwiches
recipeIngredient:
1 beef roast, like top, eye or bottom
round, approximately 3 pounds

recipeInstructions.text:
Remove roast from refrigerator.
Preheat oven to 500 degrees.

In a small bowl, mix together salt,
pepper, garlic, olive oil and red-pepper
flakes to create a kind of paste. Rub
this all over the roast. Place beef
in a roasting pan or cast-iron skillet,
fat-side up, and put in oven. Cook
undisturbed for 5 minutes per pound.

Turn off oven. Do not open oven
door. Leave roast to continue cooking,
undisturbed, for two hours.
After two hours, remove roast from oven. Slice and serve alongside, ideally, a watercress salad, some skillet-fried potatoes and a small tureen of Henry Bain sauce.
